EmailTemplate.name: Notice to Manager When Rep Action Plan is Complete
EmailTemplate.subject: Sales Competency Action Plan Completed for {!Sales_Competency__c.User__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Sales_Competency__c.Level_1_Manager__c},
{!Sales_Competency__c.User__c} has completed the Sales Competency Action Plan. To validate quality and approve the Action Plan, click this link: Sales Competency.
